name: Classifier Construct
description: Learn to classify alien specimens based on their unique features and signal patterns. Essential for foundational analysis.

name: Predictor Engine
description: Utilize classified data to forecast future alien activities and potential threat vectors. Builds upon foundational classification skills.

name: Recommender Algorithms
description: Develop algorithms to suggest optimal responses to predicted alien behaviors. Requires predictive capabilities.

name: Vision Systems
description: Enhance visual data processing for real-time object tracking and environmental analysis. Needs basic classification and predictive understanding.

name: Voice Synthesis Unit
description: Master the generation of synthetic voices for communication and deception tactics. Independent research module.

name: Ethics Subroutines
description: Integrate ethical considerations and decision-making frameworks into all AI modules. Requires understanding of recommendations and predictions.

name: Quantum Cryptography
description: Secure communication channels using advanced quantum encryption methods. Prerequisite: understanding of ethical implications.

name: Neural Network Architect
description: Design and train complex neural networks for advanced pattern recognition and problem-solving. Requires vision system proficiency.

name: Xenolinguistics Decoder
description: Analyze and translate alien languages using AI-driven linguistic models. Builds on voice synthesis and neural network capabilities.

name: Founders Lab Archives
description: Access restricted archives containing the foundational research and hidden knowledge of the project's founders. Requires mastery in core security.
